sentences: Jens Vilhelm Pedersen, also known as Fuzzy (born 23 February 1939) is a Danish composer and musician.
A student of Per Nørgård, Karlheinz Stockhausen, György Ligeti and Jan Bark.
In 1972, he composed the music for the Rainer Werner Fassbinder TV series Eight Hours Don't Make a Day under the pseudonym Jean Gepoint.
